Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder

Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder Class Reference

A class which automatically responds to CTCP queries. The replies it sends are configurable by the client. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 CtcpResponder (Connection connection)
 Create an instance and register handlers for CTCP events. The Connection's CtcpEnable property must be set to true or the connection will not send CTCP events to this responder.

Properties

 How long the responder should wait before replying to a query. Queries coming before this time has passed will be droppped.

 Where to get this client.

Detailed Description

A class which automatically responds to CTCP queries. The replies it sends are configurable by the client.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.CtcpResponder ( Connection  connection  ) 

Create an instance and register handlers for CTCP events. The Connection's CtcpEnable property must be set to true or the connection will not send CTCP events to this responder.

Parameters:
connection The containing connection.

Here is the call graph for this function:

Property Documentation

string Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.ClientInfoResponse [get, set]

Tell others what CTCP commands this client supports.

By default it sends a list of all the CTCP commands.

string Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.FingerResponse [get, set]

Finger responses normally consist of a message and the idle time.

The Idle time will be automatically appended to the finger response. This default to the UserInfo message.

double Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.ResponseDelay [get, set]

How long the responder should wait before replying to a query. Queries coming before this time has passed will be droppped.

The delay in milliseconds. The default is 2000 (2 seconds).

string Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.SourceResponse [get, set]

Where to get this client.

This can be a complex set of FTP instructions or just a URL to the client's homepage.

string Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.UserInfoResponse [get, set]

A message about the user.

Any string which does not exceed the IRC max length. This defaults to "Thresher Auto-Responder".

string Alaris.Irc.CtcpResponder.VersionResponse [get, set]

The version of the client software.

This defaults to "Thresher IRC library 1.0".
